description: Students who wish to gain further work experience and enhance their employability before they graduate can apply to enrol in FINM4999 in their final year of study. The course combines activities designed to develop employability with the knowledge and skills gained through real work experience. Successful completion of the course will provide students with the employability skills required for transition to the world of work. Entry to the course is by application only. Students who have completed certain programs offered by the BEL Faculty's Student Employability Team (SET) may be able to count these towards the course.
